description:
Yuko will need to go deeper into Momo`s subconscious so she can implant the idea that will change everything! Perhaps compassion can triumph where fighting has failed.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Asu e no Ketsui!! Omoi Kondara Tomaranai
Courage to Face the Future!! The Heavy Roller Won`t Stop
あすへの決意!! 重いコンダラ止まらない
내일로의 결의! 굳게 믿으니 멈출 수 없어
